channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- SIMATIC Drive Controller CPU 1504D TF
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- SIMATIC Drive Controller CPU 1504D TF

item.title: CVE-2023-46156|2024-05-15T07:23:40.531Z -- siemens -- simatic%20drive%20controller%20cpu%201504d%20tf
item.description: Affected devices improperly handle specially crafted packets sent to port 102/tcp. This could allow an attacker to create a denial of service condition. A restart is needed to restore normal operations.
